ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 122
ygData.msgSnippet: Personally, no.  Then again, I haven t had a need to walk into a dungeon and yell for a group since the patch.  Oddly enough, I ve always been occupied
ygData.messageBody:
Personally, no. Then again, I haven't had a need to walk into a dungeon and
yell for a group since the patch. Oddly enough, I've always been occupied
whenever I've played this character.

Lei
Warrior-Poet
Bristlebane
